page.title: 16DIAMOND FARM
page.content: SITUATED ON THE MAIN ROAD TO BREAN AND BEING WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE OF THE SHORE AND OF SHOPS,THIS FARM HAS BEEN WELL ADAPTED TO CATER FOR VISITORS WHILE,AT THE SAME TIME CARRYING ON ITS MAIN FUNCTION,THAT OF PRODUCING FOOD. THE LAND ITSELF IS FLAT.THE FARM FIELD ARE WELL MANAGED AND PRODUCE WINTER FODDER FOR THE HERD OF DAIRY CATTLE IN ADDITION TO HAVING GOOD GRAZING. THE CARAVAN SITES ARE WELL LAID OUT WITH GOOD ROADS AND WITH BASIC FACILITIES.IN ADDITION A FIELD IS SET ASIDE FOR TENTS AND FOR TOURING CARAVANS. IT IS AN EXAMPLE OF GOOD FARMING WITH GOOD HOLIDAY PROVISIONS.
